amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enforce standards of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act with respect to BPAR and ER incandescent reflector lamps.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enforce standards of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act with respect to BPAR and ER incandescent reflector lamps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 193 (Roll no. 393).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 193 (Roll no. 393).
